## VirtualizedTableHelper.setLocale() method

Set locale strings, which replaces the table header's label if matches. Default it's `Zotero.Intl.strings`

**Signature:**

```typescript
setLocale(localeStrings: {
        [name: string]: string;
    }): this;
```
